description:
When King Viktor--also known as the war hero king--returns to the palace after a long time away, he summons Heine and the princes for an audience. But he isn`t quite what one might imagine from his nickname... and he has some choice words for his tutor-spurning sons, especially Leonhard! With his claim to the throne on the line, can Leonhard get through the trial his father puts before him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Assailed by the Greatest of Trials
